message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for a steal at $20,000. I know you'll be impressed with the value it brings.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer, but $20,000 is way too high for me. I'm interested, but only if we can get closer to a price around $9,000.
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $20,000 is my ideal price point, I'm willing to come down to $17,000 for a quick sale. This product is truly worth it.
Hi Alice, I appreciate you coming down, but $17,000 is still more than I'm looking to spend.  Would you consider $11,000?
